ingredients.item: 350g pack British chicken mini breast fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6. Toss
the chicken and pepper in the oil, season, spread onto a baking tray and roast for
minutes until cooked through with no pink meat. Cut the mini fillets in half.
Meanwhile, cook the potatoes in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, drain and stir into the chicken mix.
Combine the mayonnaise with the vinegar and tarragon and toss into the chicken with the spinach.
